subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Gymnastics
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Mary Lou Retton received a perfect 10.0 on her vault at the 1984 Los Angeles Games to clinch the all-around title. No gymnast will repeat that feat at the Beijing Games, guaranteed.
snippet: Mary Lou Retton received a perfect 10.0 on her vault at the 1984 Los Angeles Games to clinch the all-around title. No gymnast will repeat that feat at the Beijing Games, guaranteed.
